name: INNOVENTION TOYS, LLC, petitioner, v. MGA ENTERTAINMENT, INC., et al.
name_abbreviation: Innovention Toys, LLC v. Mga Entm't, Inc.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
INNOVENTION TOYS, LLC, petitioner,
v.
MGA ENTERTAINMENT, INC., et al.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Halo Electronics, Inc. v. Pulse Eletronics, Inc., 579 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1923, --- L.E.2d ---- (2016).
casebody.head_matter:
INNOVENTION TOYS, LLC, petitioner,
v.
MGA ENTERTAINMENT, INC., et al.
No. 15-635.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 20, 2016.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Halo Electronics, Inc. v. Pulse Eletronics, Inc., 579 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1923, --- L.E.2d ---- (2016).
